abstract: After months of economic uncertainty caused by the European debt crisis, investors are starting to venture back into the Continent’s improving financial markets, as DKSH and Ziggo are expected to raise more than a combined $2 billion through I.P.O.’s.
snippet: After months of economic uncertainty caused by the European debt crisis, investors are starting to venture back into the Continent’s improving financial markets, as DKSH and Ziggo are expected to raise more than a combined $2 billion through I.P.O...
lead_paragraph: LONDON — After months of economic uncertainty caused by the European debt crisis, investors are starting to venture back into the Continent’s financial markets.

headline.main: As Woes Recede, Europe’s Public Offerings Find Favor
